name: red
description: A warm, bright color like apples and fire trucks!
funFact: Red is the first color babies can see!

name: blue
description: A cool, calm color like the sky and ocean!
funFact: Blue is the world's favorite color!

name: green
description: A fresh, natural color like grass and leaves!

name: yellow
description: A sunny, happy color like the sun and bananas!
funFact: Yellow is the most visible color from far away!

name: orange
description: A bright, energetic color like oranges and carrots!
funFact: Orange is named after the fruit!

name: purple
description: A royal, magical color like grapes and lavender!
funFact: Purple was once the most expensive color!

name: pink
description: A sweet, gentle color like cotton candy and flowers!
funFact: Pink has a calming effect on people!

name: brown
description: An earthy, cozy color like chocolate and tree trunks!
funFact: Brown is the color of chocolate!
